Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a light-brown pottery vessel, interior slightly grooved, exterior covered with a cream-coloured slip and remains of one line of black-painted hieratic text identifying contents.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393203) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393203)
